actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income subsistence payments to certain law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude grom gross income amounts received by certain law enforcement officers as statutory or negotiated subsistence allowances. Limits such exclusion to $5 per day.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income subsistence payments to certain law enforcement officers.
